trans-unit.source: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.
trans-unit.target: Contiene métodos, propiedades y eventos compatibles con la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> Encapsula la capacidad de descargar contenido en el contexto de una navegación de tipo explorador.

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] files.
trans-unit.target: El contenido puede ser cualquier tipo de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] objeto y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] archivos.

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: En general, sin embargo, las páginas son la manera preferida de empaquetar el contenido para la navegación (vea <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method that accepts an object:
trans-unit.target: Contenido se puede navegar a proporcionar una instancia de un objeto y llamando a una sobrecarga de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> método que acepta un objeto:

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]:
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, puede ser contenido navegado a pasando relativa o absoluta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] a uno de los <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> sobrecargas del método que acepta un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]:

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se navega al contenido por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> devolverá un objeto que contiene el contenido.

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events:
trans-unit.target: Puede realizar el seguimiento de la duración de una navegación a través de los siguientes eventos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: No todos los eventos se generan cada vez que tenga lugar la navegación; el conjunto de eventos que se produzcan se determina por el tipo de navegación que se produce (contenido o fragmento del contenido) y cómo se completa la navegación (cancelada, detenido o con errores).

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised:
trans-unit.target: La ilustración siguiente muestra la secuencia en que se producen estos eventos:

trans-unit.source: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama de flujo de navegación de página](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "diagrama de flujo de navegación de página")

trans-unit.source: During or after a navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Durante o después de una exploración, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> proporciona información acerca del contenido que se navega, incluido el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido que se navega (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>) y un objeto que contiene el contenido que se navegó (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se navega al, contenido <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> graba la navegación como una entrada en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se agrega una entrada al historial de navegación de retroceso cuando se produce una nueva navegación, mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> método, o yendo a una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se agrega una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, vaya a una entrada en la parte posterior historial de navegación, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> notificar si hay entradas en la parte posterior y el historial de navegación hacia atrás, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Además, la entrada más reciente en la parte posterior se puede quitar el historial de navegación mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> no almacena una instancia de un objeto contenido en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> crea una nueva instancia del objeto de contenido cada vez que se navega mediante el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamiento está diseñado para evitar el consumo excesivo de memoria cuando se navegue a números grandes y grandes fragmentos de contenido.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, no se recuerda el estado del contenido en un panel de navegación a la siguiente.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] proporciona varias técnicas que puede almacenar una parte de estado para una parte del contenido en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: Usar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, también puede recordar varios conjuntos de estado para una instancia de página única.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> is `sealed` class and, therefore, cannot be instantiated; instead, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> is used by navigators to enable navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> es `sealed` clase y, por lo tanto, no pueden crearse instancias; en su lugar, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> navegadores sirve para habilitar la exploración.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], there are two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], hay dos exploradores: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: Visualmente, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] usar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] como un explorador, para proporcionar una experiencia de usuario integrada.

trans-unit.source: Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and the navigation history that is managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: Físicamente, sin embargo, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] utilizar realmente <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> como el navegador; la <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> propiedad de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] ejecuta en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] devolverá una referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>y el historial de navegación que está administrado por el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> se integra con el historial de navegación que está administrado por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] de las maneras siguientes:

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se navega al contenido mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> desde una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] también se agregan las entradas del historial de navegación pertinentes a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries.
trans-unit.target: Cuando las entradas de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] están seleccionadas, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] hace <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> para ir atrás o hacia delante al contenido que está asociado con esas entradas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> puede proporcionar su propio historial de navegación, o utilizar el historial de navegación del navegador que lo hospeda.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> proporciona su propio historial de navegación, puede mostrar su propia navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] para navegar por las entradas en el historial de navegación; no se agregan las entradas en el historial de navegación del navegador host (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) y, por lo tanto, no se abrirá en el panel de navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] de cada uno de ellos (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> que representa el estado definido por la aplicación asociado a una parte concreta del contenido.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega una entrada al historial de retroceso de navegación que contiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> are used to help remember multiple sets of state for the current content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, y <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> se usan para ayudar a recordar varios conjuntos de estado para el contenido actual.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is <see langword="null" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object isn't returned from <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> es <see langword="null" /> y no se devuelve ningún objeto del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> desde <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> para determinar si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se debe inspeccionar antes de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; si <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> se llama y no hay entradas en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> se produce.

trans-unit.source: that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> for the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: que si varios navegadores comparten el historial de navegación (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), la mayoría entrada reciente en la parte posterior historial de navegación puede no haberse agregado por la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> para el explorador actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de avance de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de avance de navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> to determine whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> para determinar si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called and there are no entries in forward navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se debe inspeccionar antes de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; si <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> se llama y no hay entradas en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> se produce.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una referencia al objeto que contiene el contenido actual.

trans-unit.source: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que es una referencia al objeto que incluye el contenido actual.

trans-unit.source: Content can be set in one of two ways:
trans-unit.target: Contenido se puede establecer en uno de dos maneras:

trans-unit.source: Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: Directamente, si se establece en una referencia a un objeto.

trans-unit.source: Indirectly, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De forma indirecta, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: Establecer <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> inicia una nueva navegación; puesto que la navegación es asincrónica, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> no devuelve ningún valor si se inspecciona inmediatamente después de que se va a establecer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido al que se navegó por última vez.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> del contenido al que se navegó por última vez, si se navegó utilizando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; de lo contrario, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> property is not changed until navigation to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> no se cambia la propiedad hasta que la navegación a otra [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] se ha completado correctamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> se puede establecer con un solo fragmento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando comienza la navegación a un fragmento del contenido, lo que ocurre de inmediato, si el fragmento deseado está en el contenido actual, o una vez cargado el contenido de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] de origen, si el fragmento deseado está en un contenido diferente.

trans-unit.source: By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, which is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> whose <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> attribute is set, eg:
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, un fragmento de contenido es contenido que es contenidos en un conjunto con nombre <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, que es un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> cuyo <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> atributo está establecido, p. ej.:

trans-unit.source: You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] with a suffix in the following format:
trans-unit.target: Navegue hasta una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] fragmento proporcionando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] con un sufijo en el formato siguiente:

trans-unit.source: \#*FragmentName*
trans-unit.target: \#*FragmentName*

trans-unit.source: The following shows an example of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that refers to a content fragment:
trans-unit.target: La siguiente muestra un ejemplo de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] que hace referencia a un fragmento de contenido:

trans-unit.source: After the source page loads (after <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event is raised), fragment navigation begins and the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> attempts to locate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment.
trans-unit.target: Una vez cargada la página de origen (después de <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> evento se desencadena), comienza la navegación del fragmento y el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> intenta localizar el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragmento.

trans-unit.source: If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment is found, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> instructs the content navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) to show the fragment.
trans-unit.target: Si el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragmento se encuentra, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> indica al explorador de contenido (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) para mostrar el fragmento.

trans-unit.source: If you need to change this behavior, you can handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> to provide your own fragment navigation behavior.
trans-unit.target: Si necesita cambiar este comportamiento, puede controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> para proporcionar su propio comportamiento de navegación del fragmento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> parameter which exposes properties that are useful for this purpose, including:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> se pasa un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> parámetro que expone propiedades que son útiles para este propósito, incluyendo:

trans-unit.source: The navigator that owns this navigation service (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: El navegador que posee este servicio de navegación (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: The fragment name.
trans-unit.target: El nombre del fragmento.

trans-unit.source: You can handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> to override the default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] fragment implementation with your own custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> para invalidar el valor predeterminado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] fragmentar la implementación con su propia implementación personalizada.

trans-unit.source: If you do so, you need to set <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`; otherwise, the default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] fragment processing behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: Si lo hace, debe establecer <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> a `true`; en caso contrario, el valor predeterminado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] se aplica el comportamiento del procesamiento de fragmento.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid directly initiating navigation from within a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> event handler.
trans-unit.target: No se deben iniciar directamente la navegación desde un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Since <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> is raised during an existing navigation, initiating a new navigation from a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> event handler creates a nested navigation that can cause the <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Puesto que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> se produce durante una navegación existente, iniciar una nueva navegación de un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> controlador de eventos crea una navegación anidada que puede causar la <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> que se produzca.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can indirectly initiate navigation by creating an asynchronous work item using the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, puede iniciar indirectamente la navegación mediante la creación de un trabajo asincrónico elemento mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Fragment navigation is not supported for loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] pages (markup-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files with `Page` as the root element) in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: Navegación del fragmento no es compatible con suelto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] páginas (sólo marcado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] archivos con `Page` como el elemento raíz) en los casos siguientes:

trans-unit.source: • When navigating to a fragment in a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: • Al navegar a un fragmento de un flexible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] página.

trans-unit.source: • When navigating from a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page to a fragment in another loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: • Al navegar desde un malas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] página a un fragmento de otra [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] página.

trans-unit.source: However, a loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can navigate to its own fragments.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, un malas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] página puede navegar a sus propios fragmentos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> to provide custom fragment navigation behavior.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> para proporcionar un comportamiento de navegación del fragmento personalizado.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the example opens an error [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page if the fragment in the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] page is not found.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, el ejemplo abre un error [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] página si el fragmento en el origen de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] no se encuentra la página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> in content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> del contenido que hospeda un navegador.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia al objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> del navegador cuyo contenido incluye el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />; can be <see langword="null" /> in some cases.
trans-unit.target: Referencia al objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> del navegador cuyo contenido contiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> especificado; puede ser <see langword="null" /> en algunos casos.

trans-unit.source: A navigator has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that handles content navigation.
trans-unit.target: Un explorador tiene un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> que controla la navegación de contenido.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] has two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] tiene dos exploradores: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.

trans-unit.source: To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] navigation service, which is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class.
trans-unit.target: Para procesar las solicitudes de navegación y administrar la duración de la navegación, un navegador usa el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] servicio de navegación, que se implementa como la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> clase.

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Contenido que se hospeda en un navegador puede obtener una referencia para el navegador <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> Devuelve `null` cuando el `dependencyObject`:

trans-unit.source: Is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Es una <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: Is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> that:
trans-unit.target: Es un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> que:

trans-unit.source: Is hosted by another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Está hospedado en otro navegador.

trans-unit.source: Has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.UsesParentJournal>.
trans-unit.target: Tiene su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.UsesParentJournal>.

trans-unit.source: Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: No es parte del contenido que se hospeda en un explorador.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>:
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] proporciona dos accesos directos para adquirir una referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that processed the navigation to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be accessed from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> itself by getting the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> que procesó la navegación a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> puede tener acceso desde el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> propio obteniendo el valor de su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> utilizado por un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> procesar la navegación puede obtenerse obteniendo el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> can retrieve a navigation service by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> puede recuperar un servicio en la navegación mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="dependencyObject" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Navega hasta la entrada más reciente del historial de retroceso de navegación, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Antes de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> propiedad se puede inspeccionar para determinar si hay entradas en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: The following example navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se navega a la entrada más reciente en la parte posterior historial de navegación, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack" /> is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack" /> cuando no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the most recent entry in forward navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Navegue hasta la entrada más reciente del historial de avance de navegación, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Antes de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>, el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> propiedad se puede inspeccionar para determinar si hay entradas en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: The following example navigates to the most recent entry in forward navigation history, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se navega a la entrada más reciente en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, si existe alguno.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward" /> is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward" /> cuando no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de avance de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se ha cargado, analizado y comenzado a representar el contenido al que se navegó.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion.
trans-unit.target: Controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> si necesita detectar la información pertinente en relación con la solicitud de navegación al finalizar la carga.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Esta información está disponible desde el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> objeto que se pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> controlador de eventos e incluye:

trans-unit.source: The content and its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: El contenido y su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: El navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Datos adicionales, si el panel de navegación fue iniciado por una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: Detalles de la respuesta (mediante un <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> objeto).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> no se produce cuando la página de origen no se pudo encontrar o cargar, en cuyo caso <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> se genera.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to the specified source content.
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente al contenido de origen especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene el contenido al que navegar.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente al contenido incluido en un objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> will navigate to the <xref:System.Object> specified by `root` if the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> se le remitirá a la <xref:System.Object> especificado por `root` si se cumplen las condiciones siguientes:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> no se cancela el evento.

trans-unit.source: A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: Una solicitud web (vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) se pueden crear.

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Si `root` es `null`, el contenido existente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) está desactivada.

trans-unit.source: When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: Al descargar contenido Web, recibirá una excepción Web (por ejemplo, 404: archivo no encontrado).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar dichas excepciones desde <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> object containing the source content tree.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar hasta una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> objeto que contiene el árbol de contenido de origen.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> inicializado con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente a un contenido especificado por un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)).
trans-unit.target: El valor de `source` puede ser un servidor Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] o un módulo válido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (consulte [Pack URI en WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> will navigate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by `source` if the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> se le remitirá a la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado por `source` si se cumplen las condiciones siguientes:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> no se cancela el evento.

trans-unit.source: A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: Una solicitud web (vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) se pueden crear.

trans-unit.source: If `source` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Si `source` es `null`, el contenido existente (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) está desactivada.

trans-unit.source: When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: Al descargar contenido Web, recibirá una excepción Web (por ejemplo, 404: archivo no encontrado).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar dichas excepciones desde <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> to navigate to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> para navegar a un fragmento de contenido.

trans-unit.source: If the content identified by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the current content, it is not downloaded again.
trans-unit.target: Si el contenido se identifica por el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] es actual contenido, no se descarga de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar hasta una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene el contenido al que navegar.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente al contenido incluido en un objeto y pase un objeto con los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method has the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, although an object is passed instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Este método tiene el mismo comportamiento que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, aunque se pasa un objeto en lugar de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> object containing the source content, and passing navigation state.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar hasta una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> del objeto que contiene el contenido de origen y pasar el estado de navegación.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> inicializado con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente al contenido de origen que se encuentra en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] y pase un objeto con los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Since navigations are asynchronous, it is possible for multiple navigations to be in progress at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Puesto que navegaciones son asincrónicas, es posible que varias navegaciones estén en curso al mismo tiempo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two child frames on a single page, both frames could be navigating.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si hay dos marcos secundarios en una sola página, pueden navegar ambos marcos.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the various navigation events that are raised by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> may be raised multiple times, one for each piece of content that is being navigated to, and not necessarily in order that the navigations were requested.
trans-unit.target: En este caso, los distintos eventos de navegación que se genera mediante <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> puede ser genera varias veces, uno para cada parte del contenido que se abrirá y no necesariamente para que se solicitaron la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if a particular navigation request needs to process data that is specific to the individual request, it cannot use data that is available to all navigation requests.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, si una solicitud de navegación concreta debe procesar datos que es específicos de la solicitud individual, no puede utilizar los datos que está disponibles para todas las solicitudes de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use `navigationState` to pass data for navigation processing that is specific to one navigation request.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, puede usar `navigationState` para pasar datos de navegación de procesamiento que es específico para una solicitud de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The following event arguments provide access to navigation state:
trans-unit.target: Los siguientes argumentos de evento proporcionan acceso al estado de exploración:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> evento).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event handlers).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs.ExtraData%2A> (pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> controladores de eventos).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates navigating to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and passing navigation state.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar a un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] y pasando el estado de navegación.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> inicializado con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Download content into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions, if <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Descargue el contenido en un recinto de seguridad de confiable parcial (con el conjunto de zonas de Internet predeterminado de permisos, si es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], pass an object containing navigation state for processing during navigation, and sandbox the content.
trans-unit.target: Navegue asincrónicamente al contenido de origen situado en un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], pase un objeto que contenga el estado de navegación de procesamiento durante la navegación e incluya el contenido en el recinto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is only for standalone applications and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Este método es solo para las aplicaciones independientes y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] contenido.

trans-unit.source: This method exhibits the same behavior as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and extends it by ensuring that the content that is being downloaded is placed into a partial trust security sandbox (with the default Internet zone set of permissions - see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)).
trans-unit.target: Este método muestra el mismo comportamiento que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, lo extiende asegurándose de que el contenido que se descarga se coloca en un recinto de seguridad de confianza parcial (con el conjunto de zonas de Internet predeterminado de permisos - vea [seguridad de confianza parcial de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content" /> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se ha encontrado el contenido al que se navega y ese contenido está disponible en la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content" />, aunque no haya terminado de cargarse.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading commences.
trans-unit.target: Controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> si necesita detectar la información pertinente en relación con la solicitud de navegación al iniciarse la descarga.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Esta información está disponible desde el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> objeto que se pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> controlador de eventos e incluye:

trans-unit.source: The source page.
trans-unit.target: La página de origen.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> is raised, at least part of the source page's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tree has been parsed, and attached to target content control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> se genera, al menos una parte de la página de origen [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] árbol se ha analizado y asociado al control de contenido de destino.

trans-unit.source: The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: El navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Datos adicionales, si el panel de navegación fue iniciado por una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: Detalles de la respuesta (mediante un <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> objeto).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> no se produce cuando la página de origen no se pudo encontrar o cargar, en cuyo caso <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> se genera.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se solicita una nueva navegación.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> is raised when a new navigation is requested, but before the source content is requested, including when:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> se produce cuando se solicita una nueva navegación, pero antes de la fuente se solicita contenido, incluyendo cuándo:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called (or an entry is selected from a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> se denomina (o se selecciona una entrada en un panel de navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: A content fragment is navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Se abrirá un fragmento de contenido.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request before navigation starts.
trans-unit.target: Controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> si necesita detectar la información pertinente en relación con la solicitud de navegación antes de iniciarse la navegación.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Esta información está disponible desde el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> objeto que se pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object for the navigation is created and available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> parameter; because the actual request hasn't been made at this point, you can reconfigure the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> object, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> objeto para el panel de navegación se haya creado y disponible desde el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> parámetro; porque la solicitud real no se ha hecho en este momento, puede volver a configurar la <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> del objeto, si es necesario.

trans-unit.source: You also handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> to cancel navigation, if required, by setting <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> to true.
trans-unit.target: El usuario controle también <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs> para cancelar la navegación, si fuese necesario, estableciendo <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> en true.

trans-unit.source: If you cancel navigation, no other navigation events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Si cancela la navegación, no se produce ningún otro evento de navegación.

trans-unit.source: If your application is hosted in the browser, you cannot prevent the user from navigating away from your application by canceling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event.
trans-unit.target: Si la aplicación se hospeda en el explorador, no se puede evitar que el usuario navegue fuera de su aplicación Cancelando el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> eventos.

trans-unit.source: After the first piece of content is navigated to by a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), each piece of content that is navigated away from is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Después de la primera parte del contenido se navega a un navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), cada fragmento de contenido que se navega fuera de se agrega al historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: If you need to save state information about the content you are navigating away from, you can add the state to the journal entry for that content by setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object.
trans-unit.target: Si tiene que guardar la información de estado sobre el contenido está navegando fuera de, puede agregar el estado de la entrada de diario para que el contenido estableciendo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.ContentStateToSave%2A> con un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> to detect whether a request to refresh static content has been made and, if so, to cancel the request.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> para detectar si se ha realizado una solicitud para actualizar el contenido estático y, si es así, cancelar la solicitud.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error occurs while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando surge un error al navegar al contenido solicitado.

trans-unit.source: When either a <xref:System.Net.WebException> or an <xref:System.IO.IOException> is thrown during a navigation, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Cuando ya sea un <xref:System.Net.WebException> o un <xref:System.IO.IOException> se produce durante una navegación la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> evento se desencadena.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> that encapsulates information about both the exception and the details of the navigation that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> se pasa un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs> que encapsula la información sobre la excepción y los detalles de la navegación que produjo la excepción.

trans-unit.source: When an exception results from a failed navigation, and is unhandled, the following events are raised in the order listed:
trans-unit.target: Cuando una excepción resultante de una navegación fallida y no está controlada, se generan los siguientes eventos en el orden indicado:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>.

trans-unit.source: If a navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) is hosted by one or more navigators, `NavigationFailed` is not raised on any of them.
trans-unit.target: Si un navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) hospedada por uno o varios navegadores, `NavigationFailed` no se produce en cualquiera de ellos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: Se produce periódicamente durante una descarga y ofrece información sobre el progreso de la exploración.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs> which exposes the following progress information:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> se pasa un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs> que expone la siguiente información de progreso:

trans-unit.source: Number of bytes downloaded so far (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Número de bytes descargados hasta el momento (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A>).

trans-unit.source: Number of total bytes to download (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Número total de bytes para descargar (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A>).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> is raised once for every 1024 bytes of content downloaded, and once more if the number of remaining bytes is ever less than 1024 bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> se produce una vez por cada 1024 bytes del contenido descargado y una vez más si el número de bytes restantes es nunca inferior a 1024 bytes.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, handling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> provides a useful way to track and display the progress of a current download.
trans-unit.target: Por esta razón, control <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> proporciona una forma útil de realizar un seguimiento y mostrar el progreso de una descarga actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> won't be raised in some cases, such as when the same piece of content is navigated to, or when a content fragment is navigated to on content that is currently loaded (that is, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> no se provocará en algunos casos, como cuando se navega en el mismo elemento de contenido o cuando un fragmento de contenido se abrirá en el contenido que está cargada actualmente (es decir, el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> propiedad).
