trans-unit.source: When navigating to a compiled XAML resource, the final <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> event may not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Al navegar a un recurso XAML compilado, la última <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> no se puede generar el evento.

trans-unit.source: This means that at the end of the download, the last reported <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> value may not equal the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Esto significa que al final de la descarga, el último notificado <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.BytesRead%2A> valor no puede igualar la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationProgressEventArgs.MaxBytes%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> event to be notified when the navigation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Controlar la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> eventos para recibir una notificación cuando haya terminado el panel de navegación.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se llama al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading" /> o cuando se solicita una nueva navegación mientras hay una navegación en curso.

trans-unit.source: You handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request when downloading is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> si debe detectar la información pertinente en relación con la solicitud de navegación al detenerse la descarga.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event handler, and includes:
trans-unit.target: Esta información está disponible desde el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> objeto que se pasa a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> controlador de eventos e incluye:

trans-unit.source: The requested [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: El navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Datos adicionales, si el panel de navegación fue iniciado por una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> genera <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>, también provoca <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento en el <xref:System.Windows.Application> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo controlar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Recarga el contenido actual.

trans-unit.source: If the current content (specified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> property) is navigated to again, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not download the content again.
trans-unit.target: Si el contenido actual (especificado por el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> propiedad) se abrirá de nuevo, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> descargar el contenido nuevo.

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to re-navigate to the content, call <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para forzar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> para volver a navegar al contenido, llame a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the current content is navigated to again, whether by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, a new entry is not added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que si el contenido actual se abrirá de nuevo, ya sea llamando a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A>, no se agrega una nueva entrada en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: Quita la entrada más reciente del diario del historial de retroceso de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> más reciente del historial de retroceso de navegación, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: If two or more navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) share the same navigation history, one navigator can use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> to retrieve the back navigation history entry for a navigation that took place in another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Si dos o varios navegadores (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) comparten el mismo historial de navegación, puede usar un navegador <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> para recuperar la entrada del historial de navegación hacia atrás para una navegación que tuvieron lugar en otro navegador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual o el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del nuevo contenido al que se navega actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que contiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual o el contenido al que se navega actualmente.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] than the one currently being displayed, the navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navigates to the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Si establece esta propiedad en otro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de la que se muestra actualmente, el navegador (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) navega hasta el especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> is set to the content that is loaded from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is navigated to, unless the navigation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> se establece en el contenido que se carga desde el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] que se navega, a menos que se cancele la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and can be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A> se puede establecer con un solo fragmento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]y se puede establecer en `null`.

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: Detiene la descarga de contenido para la solicitud de navegación actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> can be called as soon as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> returns, and stops navigation that is in progress in child frames.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> se puede llamar en cuanto <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> devuelve y deja de navegación que está en curso en marcos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> event.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> método genera el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> must be called on the same thread that initiated the navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A> se debe llamar en el mismo subproceso que inició la navegación.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to stop loading.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo detener la carga.
